content: knitted vest in drops sky the piece is worked with textured pattern high neck and openings in the sides pattern no skip-094 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150-200-200-200-250 g colour 07 light sea green **knitting gauge ** 20 stitches in width and 28 row in height with textured pattern a 1 = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm for textured pattern
